description:
Wean the kids off Angry Birds and get active at camp or the beach. This bocce set is lightweight and compact enough to slip into your backpack or luggage.

  • Includes 9, 1.75in. PVC balls
  • Nylon mesh zippered pouch with bocce rules printed on the inside
  • Case dimensions are 14 x 14 x 2cm
  • For ages 3+
name: Outside Inside Backpack Bocce
